BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application no. 20085081 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 430 East 149th Street, Council District no. 17, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law for a partial tax exemption.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
